channel.title: RuneScape , Jagex Ltd 2007
channel.description: Is thier a server that is just like runescape for example no item numbers when you right click the item or in a trade and if you can actually fire a mage short like real. If so where can i get it? Thank you.

item.title: RuneScape , Jagex Ltd 2007
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

No there isn’t. We can’t keep up all the time with Jagex’s updates, the current private servers are just lame replications of Runescape.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape , Jagex Ltd 2007
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“wales 00, post:19, topic:122447”][quote author=MMcgrady1 link=topic=172127.msg1590830#msg1590830 date=1184284373]

Well first of all there is not one ATM
You wont get a server without the item id next to the name unless you make your own client (it’s client side)
That is ATM possible to code in with the intelligence of this forum but I don’t think anyone has.
You’re stuck with normal p servers atm bud.

there is one
and its made by moparscape
its just they dont let people play it
because they wana make it well better than rs2 so no one can beat it
[/quote]Not really, rofl. Moparisthebest only works with clients nowadays, it’s Silabsoft who has the 459 source. She won’t release it due to noobs who would leech it and people wouldn’t know how to code it.

wtf thats what i said[/quote]
She isnt releasing it till this community imports some common sense, soon the boards will reset, all. then we will go back to normal 317 clients and servers, we have to code the handlers and everything, and until the community shows improvement she might release it. All the 317’s will only have the packets finished.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape , Jagex Ltd 2007
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

You can actually get a server like runescape, skill and npc spawn wise, but it would take a long long time. Actually did it once, but only completed lumbridge. But if you mean getting the items like defenders etc. Nope. We dont have those, We have the 459 client… but no server.
